alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 17 at 5:56PM MDT until October 17 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Snowy and Judith Mountains, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Fergus County below 4500ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Be aware of your surroundings, especially if in forested areas for the potential of falling trees.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Northern Blaine County; Snowy and Judith Mountains
